Mermaid

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Nine Fans", the game is located in the ocean cell at the beginning, land units can board ships and have the ability to enter the ocean cell, and pioneers can build cities in the sea area. +2 [ICON_Science] technology value and +2 [ICON_Culture] culture value every round before opening up the first city. [NEWLINE]Units ignore the additional [ICON_Movement] movement cost from embarking and disembarking. Not subject to flood damage.
Cherry Love Song

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Nine Fans", for each suzerain state that becomes two city-states of the same type, a corresponding policy slot will be added. Your Theater Plaza building gains an additional [ICON_GreatWork_Music] Great Work of Music slot. [NEWLINE]The cost of recruiting city-state units has been halved, and grant them +2[ICON_Movement] movement and +5[ICON_Strength] combat strength. [ICON_Gold] gold and resources spent when collecting unit upgrades -75%. When recruiting troops from a city-state, you can get 2 [ICON_Envoy] envoys from the city-state.
school idol

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Nine Fans", when an emergency occurs, an additional bonus will be obtained. Earn rewards even if emergency events are not completed. [NEWLINE]When you create a [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route with a more advanced civilization, you can get the corresponding [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka or [ICON_CivicBoosted] Apocalypse. [NEWLINE] Whenever other civilizations get [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer, [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist, [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant or [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General, you trigger a [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka: Whenever other civilizations get [ICON_GreatProphet] ] Great Prophet, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist or [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Admiral of the Navy, you trigger a [ICON_CivicBoosted] apocalypse. [NEWLINE]The professional area of ​​the city where the third-level chief executive is located provides 1 corresponding [ICON_greatperson] great person point.
show girl

Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Nine Fans", all cities +10% [ICON_Gold] gold coins; the capital additionally +10% [ICON_Gold] gold coins. All [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes +1 [ICON_Gold] gold. Allows buying regions with [ICON_Gold] coins.
seven changes

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Jiufan", the improved strategic resources +2 [ICON_Science] science and technology value, and cities with happiness can get an additional +5% [ICON_Science] science and technology value. Cities with ecstatic happiness get double the bonus. The [ICON_Governor] chief executive who works in the city can provide +3% [ICON_Science] technology value every time he gets an enhancement.
jack lantern

Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Nine Fans", foreign cities adjacent to special units have -1 [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty every round. Looting a grid in an enemy city will cost the city 5 points of [ICON_Loyalty]. If the cities of other civilizations leave the civilization due to the decrease of [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty, and each round has the highest [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty to you, then the city will directly skip the free city stage and directly join your civilization. Every Spy starts with a free upgrade to Agent.
protected by feathers
Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Jiuban", it has the characteristics of all other dress-up Miku.
Diva Library

Uniform Meijiu characteristic buildings. This building provides 2 slots for [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] writings, [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music and any kind of [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] art. [NEWLINE]Reward 1 title of [ICON_Governor].
Diva Concert Hall
Lu Xiao Mei Jiu characteristic building. [NEWLINE]Owns [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music masterpiece. Cannot be built if there is already an Archeology Museum or Art Museum in the Theater Square area.
Theme bonus is doubled when showing [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music from different musicians.
Diva Garden

Lu Xiao Mei Jiu characteristic building. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1[ICON_Culture] culture value, +2[ICON_Gold] gold coins. +2 [ICON_Appeal] Charisma. After continuous progress in the technology and civic trees, additional [ICON_Culture] culture value and [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance can be obtained. Cannot be built on snow, tundra, snow hills, tundra hills or next to other gardens.
Miku
When you produce divas, consume great musicians, and obtain musical masterpieces, there is a certain chance of recruiting Miku. She owns five [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music works.
diva band

Lu Xiao Mei Jiu's unique support unit, which can heal adjacent units and replaces rock bands. [NEWLINE] After running the Pojun Diva project, the corresponding ability can be provided to adjacent units. [NEWLINE]Rock concerts can be performed in valid venues, including wonders, areas with required buildings, or special cell targets allowed by band promotions. Their album sales data is the [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance strength that the next concert is expected to bring. After performing in concert, their band level can be improved. Must be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith. It is not possible to perform on the same cell twice.
SS
The iconic Miku unique medieval light cavalry unit that replaces the Stalker. [NEWLINE]Each adjacent recruited unit gives it +3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
Breaking the Army and Bearing the Shield

Kasuga Miku characteristic classical era support unit. [NEWLINE]Non-cavalry land units on the same cell as it defend +4[ICON_Strength] combat strength. [NEWLINE] After unlocking the technology "Gunpowder", you will be eliminated, but you can be promoted to a medical soldier.
Shield soldier
+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against non-cavalry land units on the same cell.
Negative shield bonus
+4 Combat Strength from shielded soldiers
Army Sniper Squad

Kasuga Miku Featured Atomic Age Support Unit. [NEWLINE]Greatly increases damage against melee, ranged and anti-cavalry units (+20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength). Ineffective against other units, but able to preferentially target enemy support units.
kill
+20 [ICON_Strength] combat strength against melee, ranged and anti-cavalry units.
+20 Combat Strength against melee, ranged and anti-cavalry units
Demolition Squad
Kasuga Miku characteristic Renaissance support unit. [NEWLINE]Effective close-range blasting of areas (+20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength). Very poorly effective against other targets.
blasting
+20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking the area.
+20 Combat Strength from Demolition Zones
Pojun Modern Demolition Squad
Kasuga Miku features a modern support unit. [NEWLINE]Effective close-range blasting of areas (+20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength). Very poorly effective against other targets.
Pathfinder

Kasuga Miku features medieval support units. Ignores the additional [ICON_Movement] movement cost of Forests, Rainforests and Hills. When making a move, form an escort formation with all relevant land units (choose Pathfinder to do it yourself).
explore the way
Form a formation with land units so that they ignore the additional [ICON_Movement] movement cost of Forests, Rainforests and Hills.
Breaking Army Chariot

Bunny Girl Miku features Ancient Era heavy cavalry unit, replaces heavy chariot. [NEWLINE]No debuffs against anti-armor units. [ICON_Movement] Movement is 4 if the unit starts its turn on open terrain.
Guards

Pumpkin Witch Miku Unique Renaissance melee unit, replaces Musketeer. [NEWLINE]Start with free boosts. Stronger than the Musketeer, the cost is also lower. To train Janissaries, the city must have at least 2 population. If the Praetorians are trained in the city founded by Mijiu, the city will lose 1 point of population.
Guards
Nadeko Miku Unique Renaissance melee unit that replaces the Musketeer. [NEWLINE]Heal yourself when you kill an enemy unit.
Praetorian Guard
+30[ICON_Damaged] HP after defeating an enemy unit.
Breaking Army Submarine

Deep Sea Meijiu features a modern naval unit that replaces submarines. [NEWLINE]The production cost is lower, +1 vision, +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting in ocean cells. Can reveal other invisible units.
I'm Miku Yuya, chairman of the Tenou Festival Operation Committee of Rindouji Women's Academy. Please give me your advice~~
Want to come to our concert? (invites you to visit)
Hehe, of course, I am also very interested in your school. (accept your invitation)
Do you want to jointly hold a school festival? (exchange the location of the capital)
I want to be more cute~
Darling, how about spending the next vacation together? (A declaration of friendship was issued.)
Get out of my sight! (Declaration of friendship rejected.)
I ask you, do you want to hear me sing? (Yu Xiao Mijiu seeks a declaration of friendship with you.)
Everyone is yearning for my singing voice... I really love this space. (Published a declaration of friendship with Yuya Miku.)
It's okay, anyway, human beings... are just my pawns and toys. (Refused the declaration of friendship with Miku Miku.)
Please disappear from this stage, this world, this time and space as quickly as possible~ (Declaration of war on Miku Miku.)
Please disappear as quickly as possible...from this stage...from this world...from this precise time and space!
Woohoo, I've been seen by a man with my pure and pure skin, and I can't get married~~Everything is over, Meijiu's body is no longer pure~~(Yuxiao Meijiu was defeated.)

Welcome to my concert. (The visit of the special envoy has been accepted.)
Hum Henghu, you can't fool me. I will not believe in anything but my own voice. (The special envoy's visit has been rejected.)
Do you want to go on a date during the rare holiday? (Yu Xiao Mijiu asked the special envoy to visit.)
The response is great, are you fascinated by me~ (I was accepted as a special envoy.)
Hate it! (The special envoy's visit was denied.)
Don't speak as if you understand everything...! As long as I have this 'voice', I can become the best idol! (A statement of reproach was issued to Yu Xiao Miku.)

Why are you talking to me? Please shut up, it feels so disgusting~ Please don't make any noise~ Please don't spit indiscriminately. Please don't breathe. (Induced by Xiao Mijiu issued a statement of reproach.)
Hehe, do you want to hear me sing? (The establishment of the embassy has been accepted.)
Don't, stop joking! Disappear quickly! (The establishment of the embassy has been rejected.)
Can I go there and hold a concert? (Yu Xiao Mijiu wanted to set up an embassy.)
Oh, I like Darling the most. (Allowed to open an embassy.)
M- what are you doing! (Refused to open an embassy.)
Here you come, Darling!

That shrine worships Yue Lao, and I heard that couples who go to worship in the autumn festival will be together forever. Of course you'd ask someone on a date, wouldn't you, Darling? (Already agreed to form an alliance.)
What kind of voice is that. Can you stop polluting my eardrums and those of my elves with dirty sounds? (Refused to form an alliance.)
Why, if I am also in danger, do you want to say that you will risk your life to save me! (Alliance negotiations begin)

That shrine worships Yue Lao, and I heard that couples who go to worship in the autumn festival will be together forever. Of course you'd ask someone on a date, wouldn't you, Darling? (Agree to form an alliance.)
Even if you lose your 'voice'. Even if everyone doesn’t come to listen to my singing—(Refused to form an alliance.)
Only you... can trust me. (Agree to deal.)
You shut up will you walk the dirt. (Refused to trade.)
Only you... can trust me. (The transaction is established.)
What an uncomfortable person. It's a walking calamity. (Transaction declined.)
Hehehe, this is not a bad thing. (Yu Xiao Mijiu is satisfied with the terms and conditions.)
Why are you talking to me? Please shut up, it feels so disgusting~ Can you please stop breathing? (Yuxiao Mijiu declined the request.)
Eh……! ? You, you exposed your true nature...! (Yuxiao Meijiu accepted the request.)
Ah, yes. Otherwise do it. You are here to say that you want to give up Tohka~~ (Accepted Yuxiao Miku's request.)
Please shut up, it feels so disgusting~ Can you please stop breathing? (Refused Yuxiao Miku's request.)
Hehe, okay, I will forgive you just once. (Conclude peace negotiations with Miku Miku.)
Even if I use the soles of my shoes, I don't want to touch you~ (I was tempted by Miku to reject the peace negotiation.)

I will use my 'voice' to order the girl you like to be your slave, see how much you want, how about it? They will absolutely obey what you say, and will do anything for you. (Yuxiao Meijiu proposes peaceful negotiations.)
Hehehe, this is not a bad thing. (Conclude peace negotiations with Miku Miku.)
Why didn't you fall off? Why didn't they die? (Rejected the peaceful negotiation of Yuya Miku.)
Why are you so impatient... Darling, Darling is really H... (Yu Xiao Mijiu allows the border to open.)

Even if your ugliness caused you to return to the earth in broken bones, that land would never be able to bear life again because of the curse you spread that will never disappear. (Yuxiao Mijiu refused to open the border.)
Can you let me pass by~ (Yuxiao Mijiu asked for the border to be opened.)
hehe. (Yu Xiao Mijiu was allowed to open the border.)
Don't you really know? Are you not listening to anyone? Can you please disappear as soon as possible? (Yu Xiao Mijiu was refused to open the border.)
You are special~~ (Yu Xiao Mijiu made a promise to you to stop settling near the border.)
Do...what are you doing...just talk nonsense! (Yu Xiao Mijiu ignored the warning and continued to settle near the border.)
You are special~~ (Yuxiao Miku promised you not to take military action.)
Do...what are you doing...just talk nonsense! (Inducing Xiao Meijiu to ignore the warning and seek opportunities for military action.)
You are special~~ (Yuxiao Miku promised you not to send spies.)
Do...what are you doing...just talk nonsense! (Yuki Miku ignores the warning and continues to spy.)
You are special~~ (Yuxiao Meijiu promises you not to steal secret treasures.)
Do...what are you doing...just talk nonsense! (Yuxiao Meijiu ignored the warning and continued to steal secret treasures.)
You are special~~ (Yu Xiao Mijiu promised you to stop missionary work.)
Do...what are you doing...just talk nonsense! (Yuxiao Mijiu ignored the warning and continued her missionary activities.)
Yuxiao Meijiu asks you: stop colonizing near the border
You are special~~ (Agree to Yuxiao Miku's request.)
That...that kind of words──I don't believe it! (Rejects the request to lure Xiao Meijiu.)
Yuxiao Meijiu asks you: Do not send troops near the border
You are special~~ (Agree to Yuxiao Miku's request.)
That...that kind of words──I don't believe it! (Rejects the request to lure Xiao Meijiu.)

You are special~~ (Agree to Yuxiao Miku's request.)

You are special~~ (Agree to Yuxiao Miku's request.)
That...that kind of words──I don't believe it! (Rejects the request to lure Xiao Meijiu.)
...You, guarded our agreement. If it's you, no problem. (Yuxiao Mijiu wants to continue the alliance.)

Even if I lose my [voice], even if everyone doesn't come to listen to my singing. As long as you're here, that's enough. When that time comes... I will sing just for you. (Allows the continuation of the alliance that lures Xiao Meijiu.)
That...that kind of words──I don't believe it! (The continuation of the alliance that refuses to lure Xiao Meijiu.)

Even if I lose my [voice], even if everyone doesn't come to listen to my singing. As long as you're here, that's enough. When that time comes... I will sing just for you. (Continuation of the alliance has been licensed.)

〈Raliyah〉
Has Ziyin hair and Ziyin pupils, and the characteristics of unhurried speech, big breasts. It was confirmed to have appeared in the world once half a year ago, but there is no other detailed data.

In fact, she has been in the real world since half a year ago, and has integrated into human society like Tokisaki Kurumi. The students of Rindouji Women's Academy are even more active as idols that men can't get close to. She has an extremely male-hating personality that drops her favorability to that of a cockroach just by talking to her, and she is a spirit who likes women, lilies, very much. He has a strong dependence on his own voice ability, and worries that he will be useless after losing it.

Identification name: Diva; Spirit outfit: Kamui Spirit Garment·Jiuban, wearing hollow sleeves and a lace-shaped belt of light on the upper body, and a dress of light with a skirt of light frills underneath, and a moon-shaped ornament on the head . Angel: The singer of the broken army is a huge organ with a keyboard of light, and the silver pipe can be used as a microphone.
